      • findAllAvailablePlans

        public <T extends Plan> IQueryBeanResult<T> findAllAvailablePlans(IEntityType planSubType,
                                                         Currency currency,
                                                         StandardQueryFilter.QueryFilter queryFilter)
        Returns the results of a query of available plans with additional restrictions specified through a QueryFilter.

        Besides filtering for active plans (and optionally those for a specified Currency), this allows further restriction of the result Plans through the queryFilter parameter. For example, PaymentPlans can be filtered to those that are user-visible by passing this block as the filter:

        \ query -> query.compare("UserVisible", Equals, true)

        Type Parameters:
        T - The Plan subtype.
        Parameters:
        planSubType - the IEntityType that identifies the Plan subtype.
        currency - optional Currency to which to restrict result Plan subtypes
        queryFilter - optional filter to add further restrictions to the query
        Returns:
        A query result for the specified Plan subtype.

      • findActivePlanByExactName

        public <T extends Plan> T findActivePlanByExactName(IEntityType planType,
                                           java.lang.String name)

      • findActivePlanByMatchingName

        public <T extends Plan> T findActivePlanByMatchingName(IEntityType planType,
                                              java.lang.String name)

      • findActivePlanByMatchingName

        public <T extends Plan> T findActivePlanByMatchingName(IEntityType planType,
                                              java.lang.String name,
                                              StandardQueryFilter.QueryFilter queryFilter)
        Return an available Plan subtype instance whose name "matches" (by containing) the specified name with additional restrictions specified through a QueryFilter.

        For example, CommissionPlans can be filtered to that with a specific ProducerTier by passing this block as the filter:

        \ query -> query.compare("Tier", Equals, producerTier)

        Type Parameters:
        T - The Plan subtype.
        Parameters:
        planType - the IEntityType that identifies the Plan subtype.
        name - the matching name.
        queryFilter - optional filter to add further restrictions to the query
        Returns:
        A Plan subtype instance whose name contains the specified match.
